VerticalLayout.Text:
Welcome to Star Wars: Legion for TTS, v7.0.0-beta.
This is a beta release, and is not suitable for tournament play.
To access the stable version of the mod visit https://go.swlegion.dev/mod.
CHANGELOG
(Since last Beta)
- Fix: Range ruler sizes and some token descriptions.
(Since last Stable) - Feat: Camera starts facing BLUE player now (not RED). - Feat: Added cohesion hotkey. - Feat: Support auto-Locking on moves.
- Feat: Applied various point and errata changes (best effort). - Feat: Battle cards now specify objects and zones programatically. - Feat: Added full support for Skirmish battlefield decks. - Feat: In-game list building improvements, including "Clone Previous".
- Fix: New semi-transparent range rulers and a speed-1 movement fix. - Fix: Various pilots that were not selectable w/ list-builder are now. - Fix: Medium base size and various movement tool oddities. - Fix: Replaced movement tool colliders. - Fix: Lists with an Empire unit now spawn as expected (no errors). - Fix: Multiple issues with defining the battlefield and tokens. - Fix: ID10 now spawns properly from online list builders. - Fix: Blue player upgrade cards are no longer previewed upside down. - Fix: Offensive/Defensive stance now selectable using the in-game builder. - Fix: B2-HA Trooper spawns the right model. - Fix: Spawned unit-specific tokens have ranges and are in bags only.
